Usage¶

Installation¶

To use TexasHoldEm, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install TexasHoldEm

Starting a game¶

After installation, you can play the game! To start the game, use the .() function:

src.run_game.run_player_decisions()¶

Return …(describe how to play the game here)

Parameters:

kind –

Returns:

Return type:

TexasHoldEm
